"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Dɛm ntsi ɔwo
dɛ: onyimpa ba
, " EZK.12.2": siesie tukɔr ndzɛmba na tu ewiaber kɔ wɔ hɔn enyim; na tu fi mbrɛ ewɔ no kɔ beebi fofor wɔ hɔn enyim: bi a wɔbɔdwen ho
"Onyimpa ba: kaansa wɔyɛ etuatsew fi mpo a."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Na yi wo ndzɛmba ewiaber fir edzi wɔ hɔn enyim
dɛ: dɛ tukɔr ndzɛmba: na ɔwoara dze
, " EZK.12.2": si mu ewimbir wɔ hɔn enyim
"Onyimpa ba: dɛ aber a nkorɔfo rutu akɔ ndɔmmum."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Bɔr fasu mu wɔ hɔn enyim
dɛ: na soa adze dua mu pue."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Bɔ no akɔnkɔn wɔ hɔn enyim
dɛ: na fa dua sum mu fir edzi; kata w’enyim mma eennhu daadze: na medze wo mayɛ asɛnkyerɛdze mama Israelmba."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Na meyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔhyɛɛ me no: medze me ndzɛmba fiir edzi ewiaber
dɛ: dɛ tukɔr ndzɛmba
"Onyimpa ba: medze me nsa bɔɔr fasu no mu; medze nam sum mu fiir edzi
etse etuatsew fi mu; hɔn a wɔwɔ enyi a: na mobɔɔ no akɔnkɔn wɔ hɔn enyim."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Na adze kyee no
dɛ: EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ dɛ

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Se hɔn dɛ
dɛ: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Adzesoa yi fi ɔhen a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no ho
, " EZK.12.2": na Israelmba nyina a wɔwɔ hɔn mu no ho."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Ka dɛ
dɛ: Emi nye hom asɛnkyerɛdze: dɛ mbrɛ mayɛ no
, " EZK.12.2": dɛmara na wɔdze bɛyɛ hɔn: wobotu akɔ ndɔmmum."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Na ɔhen a ɔwɔ hɔn mu no bɔsoa adze wɔ no kɔn ho wɔ sum mu
dɛ: na oefir edzi: wɔbɔbɔr fasu mu na wɔdze edua mu efir edzi: ɔbɛkata n’enyim

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Mobɔtow mo boa so megu no do
dɛ: na wɔapa no wɔ m’efir mu: na medze no bɛba Babilɔn wɔ Kaldeafo asaase do; naaso orunnhu
, " EZK.12.2": kaansa hɔ na obowu mpo a."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Na hɔn a woetwa no ho ehyia dɛ wɔbɔboa no nyina
dɛ: na n’asafo nyina
, " EZK.12.2": mobɔbɔ hɔn apetse mframa nyina mu; na mobɔtwe afona no etsiw hɔn."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE
dɛ: ber a mobɔhotse amanaman mu
, " EZK.12.2": na mabɔ hɔn apetse nkurow nkurow do."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Na mibegyaa hɔn mu nyimpa kumaabi efi afona
dɛ: ɔkɔm na yardɔm nsa; ama waaka hɔn ekyiwadze nyina akyerɛ wɔ amanaman a wɔbɛba mu no mu; na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Bio so EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ
dɛ: dɛ
na wonnhu; wɔwɔ aso a wɔdze tse: na fa ahopopo na nhwɛyie nom wo nsu;"

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "na se asaase no do nkorɔfo no dɛ
dɛ: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se wɔ Jerusalɛmmba
, " EZK.12.2": na Israel asaase ho nye yi: Wɔdze nhwɛyie bedzi hɔn edziban
"Onyimpa ba: na wɔdze ahobow anom hɔn nsu
etse etuatsew fi mu; hɔn a wɔwɔ enyi a: ama n’asaase ayɛ afo wɔ dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara ho
na wonnhu; wɔwɔ aso a wɔdze tse: osian hɔn a wɔtse do nyina hɔn akakabensɛm ntsi."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Na nkurow a wɔtsetse do nyina bɔbɔ
dɛ: na asaase no adan afo; na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ
dɛ: dɛ
etse etuatsew fi mu; hɔn a wɔwɔ enyi a: ebɛn abɛbusɛm nye yi a hom wowɔ no Israel asaase do dɛ
na wonnhu; wɔwɔ aso a wɔdze tse: Nda mu atwe na enyido adzehu biara yɛ kwa yi?"

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Dɛm ntsi ka kyerɛ hɔn dɛ
dɛ: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Mebɛma abɛbusɛm yi abɔ adze
, " EZK.12.2": na worummbu no dɛ bɛ bio wɔ Israel; na se hɔn dɛ
"Onyimpa ba: Nda no na enyido adzehu nyina no nsunsuando abɛn."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Na enyido adzehu gyangyan anaa adzɛfɛdzɛfɛw mbusu nkɔnhyɛ biara remmba Israel fi mu ara bio."
"Na emi nye EWURADZE; mebɛkasa
dɛ: na asɛm a mebɛka no
, " EZK.12.2": ɔbɛba mu; wɔronntwe nnkɔ ekyir bio: na
etse etuatsew fi mu; hɔn a wɔwɔ enyi a: hom nda mu na mebɛka asɛm no na mayɛ

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ bio dɛ
etse etuatsew fi mu; hɔn a wɔwɔ enyi a: hɔn a wɔwɔ Israel fie no se dɛ
na wonnhu; wɔwɔ aso a wɔdze tse: Enyido adzehu a ohu no ayɛ nda pii a ɔreba nedze
na wɔnntse; osiandɛ wɔyɛ etuatsew fi.": na ɔhyɛ mber a ɔwɔ ekyirekyir ho nkɔm."

"EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ so: "Dɛm ntsi se hɔn dɛ
dɛ: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye yi; Wɔronntwe me nsɛm mu biara nnkɔ ekyir bio
